Alphah:

The femme smiled, she suddenly said "Perhaps you can help us to deal 
with someone... he "her voice tembled and a tear appeared in one of 
her eyes, she cleaned it with one of her hands"Sorry... A friend was 
reprogrammed... he..."

She didn't find the words
